definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
hard to distinguish real from imitation
diagnosis and treatment based on an overall analysis of the illness and the patient's condition
can't judge true or false (idiom); unable to distinguish the genuine from the fake/not to know whether to believe (what one reads in the news)
lit. cannot tell beans from wheat (idiom); fig. ignorant of practical matters
pattern-syndrome identification based on the eight principles (TCM)

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the validity of decompressive hemicraniectomy of massive cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨去骨辨减压术治疗大面积脑梗死的有效性。

sentences.english: Chinese people around the world are proud that China will host the Games.
sentences.chinese: 全世界的中国人都为中国能举辨奥运而骄傲。

sentences.english: Perhaps because it was dark, he didn't recognize where he was at all.
sentences.chinese: 也许是因为四下里太黑了，他辨不清自己身在何处。

sentences.english: A pile of crushed cushions remained to show where Illyrio had sprawled.
sentences.chinese: 一堆皱皱巴巴的靠枕依稀辨得出伊利里欧曾经的碾压。

sentences.english: This article introduced professor Wang Xiafang's clinical experience in the differentiation and treatment of coughing variant asthma (CVA).
sentences.chinese: 介绍王霞芳教授辨治咳嗽变异性哮喘的临床经验。

sentences.english: I am fem, But two rabbits walk on terra, Who can identify that I am male or trigamous ?
sentences.chinese: 我虽是女儿，可双兔傍地走，安能辨我是雄雌？

sentences.english: But the plentiful Zi of willow, then in the smoke also Bian get.
sentences.chinese: 但杨柳的丰姿，便在烟雾里也辨得出。

definition: lit. crooked and straight/fig. right and wrong, good and evil
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
to find out/to search out/to uncover/to discover
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
